response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the operations and growth of your business. This product, tailored with cutting-edge technology and innovative features, is designed to provide unparalleled benefits and efficiency. Given its exceptional capabilities and market value, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000.

This opportunity is unique, as it allows you to secure such a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, potentially saving your company substantial resources and time in the long run. By investing in this product, you'll be positioning your business for success and staying ahead of the competition.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product's specifications, benefits, or how it can be integrated into your existing systems. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the growth of your organization.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
